      • getStagingMetadata

        protected Metadata getStagingMetadata(String id,
                                      String configId,
                                      Boolean overwrite)
                               throws InstantiationException,
                                      IOException,
                                      MetExtractionException
        Parameters:
        id - Relative path from staging root to product. The met extension will be added to this id to look up and see if a met file exists with in the met area.
        configId - Reference to the extractor config. ExtractorConfigReader will load the configuration
        overwrite - Flag to indicate whether or not to overwrite a met file if present in the staging area.
        Returns:
        The Metadata retrieved from the met area path if present or extracted using the met extractor config.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        InstantiationException
        IOException
        MetExtractionException

                            throws MetExtractionException
        Parameters:
        id - Relative path from staging root to the product
        config - Configuration to run this met extractor
        Returns:
        Throws:
        MetExtractionException

      • readMetFile

        public Metadata readMetFile(String file)
                     throws InstantiationException,
                            IOException
        Reads a Metadata object from a String representation of a .met File.
        Parameters:
        file - The full path to the .met File.
        Returns:
        The read-in CAS Metadata object.
        Throws:
        InstantiationException
        InstantiationException - If there is an error instantiating the Metadata class.
        IOException
        FileNotFoundException
        FileNotFoundException - If the .met File is not found.
        IOException - If there is an IO problem opening the met file.

      • getCatalogMetadata

        public Metadata getCatalogMetadata(Product product)
                            throws CatalogException
        Retrieves the cataloged Metadata associated with a Product.
        Parameters:
        product - The Product to obtain cataloged Metadata for.
        Returns:
        The cataloged Metadata for Product.
        Throws:
        CatalogException - If there is an error talking to the CAS File Manager Catalog.

      • writeMetFile

        public void writeMetFile(String id,
                         Metadata metadata)
                  throws IOException
        Writes a CAS Metadata File using the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the .met file to write.
        metadata - The Metadata object to persist and write to a File .
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If the .met File cannot be written.
        IOException - If there is an IO exception writing the File.

      • updateMetadata

        public String updateMetadata(javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> formParams,
                             String id,
                             String name,
                             boolean replace,
                             boolean remove)
        Method to update the catalog metadata for a given product. All current metadata fields will be preserved, except those specified in the HTTP POST request as 'metadata.='.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of CAS product - either 'id' or 'name' must be specified
        name - name of CAS product - either 'id' or 'name' must be specified
        formParams - HTTP (name, value) form parameters. The parameter names MUST start with "metadata."
        replace - optional flag set to false to add the new metadata values to the existing values, for the given flags

      • updateCatalogMetadata

        public void updateCatalogMetadata(Product product,
                                  Metadata newMetadata)
                           throws CatalogException,
                                  IOException
        Updates the cataloged Metadata for a Product in the CAS File Manager.
        Parameters:
        product - The Product to update Metadata for.
        Throws:
        CatalogException - If any error occurs during the update.
        IOException
        FileNotFoundException

      • deleteCatalogMetadata

        public String deleteCatalogMetadata(String id,
                                    String name)
        Method to delete a specific product from the catalog
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of CAS product - either 'id' or 'name' must be specified
        name - name of CAS product - either 'id' or 'name' must be specified
        Returns:
        the product ID of the deleted product if deletion successful
